ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LID
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: It refers to the physical lane in which the logical lane will be placed. For example, if a 01 HEX is located in the first five bits [4:0] corresponding to LID0, that means that the link layer output will set the input from lane 1 in the serdes_data_i bus, to the output of lane 0 in the data_to_tl bus.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SUBCLASS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Subclass mode of operation (0, 1, or 2)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CF
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of control words per converter device. (CF=0, or 1)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CF_FIRST_LANE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indicates lane when control words are found

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CF_FIRST_NIBBLE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If CF=1, it indicates the CF-lane’s first 4-bit nibble position of the control bits

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: CS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of control bits per sample (0-3)

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of control bits per sample (0-3)

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: F
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of octets per frame. Legal values are 0-7 Encoding is binary value minus 1.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: K
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of frames per multi frame. Legal values are 0-31. Encoding is binary value minus 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: K
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of frames per multi frame.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: L
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of lanes per converter device. Legal values are 0-3 Encoding is binary value minus 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: L
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of lanes per converter device.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: N
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Converter resolution. Legal values are 7, 9, 11, 13, 14, and 15. Encoding is binary values minus 1.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: M
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of converters per device. Legal values are 0-7 Encoding is binary value minus 1.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: NTOTAL
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Total number of bits per sample (N’). Must be an integer multiple of 4. Legal values are 7-15 Encoding is binary value minus 1

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NTOTAL
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Total number of bits per sample (N’).

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: S
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of samples per Converter, per frame cycle. Legal values are 0 to 3. Encoding is binary value minus 1

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: S
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of samples per Converter, per frame cycle.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: HD
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: High Density Format. 0 ~ High Density format not used 1 ~ High Density format used

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SCR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Scrambling enabled

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LINKCONFIGURATIONERROR
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: For LANE_0 (bit 0) to LANE_3 (bit 3). Indication that data received during the lane synchronization sequence matches the configuration of the Rx module. 0 ~ No mismatch 1 ~ Mismatch

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LINKCONFIGURATIONERROR
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Indication that data received during the lane synchronization sequence matches the configuration of the Rx module.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: ENABLEMODULE
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Enable operation of the module. 0 ~ Module disabled 1 ~ Module enabled

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: ENABLELINKTEST
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Enable link layer test. 0 ~ No link layer test performed. 1 ~ Receive continuous sequence of /K28.5/ characters, and count frames and bit errors (LINKTEST1). 2 ~ Receive code group sequence, followed by repeated lane alignment sequence, and count frames and bit errors (LINKTEST2). 3 ~ No link layer test performed.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_0_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received frames or characters. If link layer testing is enabled the number of received characters (LINKTEST1) or frames (LINKTEST2) is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_0_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of received frames or characters.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_1_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received frames or characters. If link layer testing is enabled the number of received characters (LINKTEST1) or frames (LINKTEST2) is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_1_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of received frames or characters.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_2_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received frames or characters. If link layer testing is enabled the number of received characters (LINKTEST1) or frames (LINKTEST2) is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_2_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of received frames or characters.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_3_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received frames or characters. If link layer testing is enabled the number of received characters (LINKTEST1) or frames (LINKTEST2) is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_3_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of received frames or characters.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_0_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If link layer testing is enabled the number of detected errors is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_1_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If link layer testing is enabled the number of detected errors is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_2_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If link layer testing is enabled the number of detected errors is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: LINKTEST_3_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If link layer testing is enabled the number of detected errors is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RX_FEATURE_DISABLE
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Disable features in the Rx module for compatibility with other devices.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: INITIAL_LANE_ALIGNMENT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Initial lane alignment. When enabled, it will check for the ILAS after 4 control characters k28.5 arrive to the receiver. If disabled, the incoming data will be considered standard data after the Code group synchronization. 0 ~ Enabled 1 ~ Disabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LANE_ALIGNMENT_MONITORING
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Lane alignment monitoring and correction. When enabled, the core will monitor the correct sending of the control characters in the ILAS. 0 ~ Enabled 1 ~ Disabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LANE_ALIGNMENT_CHARACTER_REPLACEMENT
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Lane alignment character replacement. When enabled the core will replace the control characters for the corresponding data according to the standard. If disabled, the control characters will remain in the output data. 0 ~ Enabled 1 ~ Disabled

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: LANE_ALIGNMENT_PROCESSING
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Processing of initial lane alignment character replacement sequence. When enabled, the register LINKCONFIGURATIONERROR will show if the received ILAS matches the expected ILAS sequence. When disabled no information will be shown in the LINKCONFIGURATIONERROR register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RE_INITIALIZATION_VIA_DATA_INTERFACE
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Re-initialization via data interface. When enabled, any symbol error will cause a resynchronization. When disable a not-in-table or disparity error will not cause a resynchronization. 0 ~ Enabled 1 ~ Disabled

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RX_CORE_INTERRUPT_MASK
ipxact:register.ipxact:description:
Register to hold interrupt mask bits.
Bit value 0 indicates the interrupt source is unmasked. Bit value 1 indicates the interrupt source is masked.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Signaled_error_on_sync_b
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance signals an error report on the Sync signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Signaled_resynchronization_request_on_sync_b
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance sends a resynchronization request on the Sync signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Detected_under_run_in_RX_data_path
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance internal modules have an under run condition.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Detected_over_run_in_RX_data_path
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance internal modules have an overrun condition.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Detected_rx_disparity_errror
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance detects rx_disparity_error in periods during user data / ILAS is received.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Unexpected_control_character
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance detects unexpected_control_ _character in periods during user data / ILAS is received.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Not_in_table_error
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance detects not in table error in periods during user data / ILAS is received.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: A_control_character_is_received_that_is_not_expected_at_the_given_character_position
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance detects valid control character during user data / ILAS is received

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Code_group_synchronization_error
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance detects a code group synchronization error during reception.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RX_CORE_INTERRUPT_STATUS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description:
Register to hold interrupt status bits.
Similar to RX_CORE_INTERRUPT_MASK, except the fields are status fields of RC type which are set by the hardware in RX_CORE

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Signaled_error_on_sync_b
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance signals an error report on the Sync signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Signaled_resynchronization_request_on_sync_b
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance sends a resynchronization request on the Sync signal.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Detected_under_run_in_RX_data_path
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance internal modules have an under run condition.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Detected_over_run_in_RX_data_path
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance internal modules have an overrun condition.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Detected_rx_disparity_errror
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance detects rx_disparity_error in periods during user data / ILAS is received.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Unexpected_control_character
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance detects unexpected_control_ _character in periods during user data / ILAS is received.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Not_in_table_error
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance detects not in table error in periods during user data / ILAS is received.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: A_control_character_is_received_that_is_not_expected_at_the_given_character_position
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance detects valid control character during user data / ILAS is received

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Code_group_synchronization_error
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field controls whether an interrupt should be asserted when RX core instance detects a code group synchronization error during reception.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RX_ILAS_ADN_MISC_DETAILS
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Register to hold details of ILAS length and RBD information

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: MULTIFRAME_LENGTH_OCTETS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field gives the length of multi frame in terms of octets. It refers to F multiplied by K.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: RBD_LENGTH_OCTETS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: This field gives the length of RBD frames in terms of octets.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: NUM_MULTIFRAMES_IN_ILAS
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of multi frames in ILAS. Legal values are 3 to 255. Actual length is programmed value + 1

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: RX_ERR_INJ_REQ
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Register to allow injection of different errors to test interoperability with firmware

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Req_Resynchronization
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write of 1 to this bit will cause 4 consecutive symbols on serdes interface to have not in table error

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Inject_not_in_table_error
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write of 1 to this bit will cause 1 symbol on serdes interface to have not in table error

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Inject_Lane_alignment_error
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write of 1 to this bit will cause 2 consecutive symbol on serdes interface to be replaced with /A/

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: Inject_frame_alignment_error
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Write of 1 to this bit will cause 2 consecutive symbol on serdes interface to be replaced with /F/

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PRBS_TEST_ENABLE
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Enable PRBS analyzing for individual links. 0 ~ No PRBS test performed. 1 ~ PRBS test performed.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: JTSPAT_TEST_ENABLE
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Enable JTSPAT analyzing for individual links. 0 ~ No JTSPAT test performed. 1 ~ JTSPAT test performed.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: CLK_RATIO
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Ratio between the clk_sample and clk_character “00”: clk_sample is equal to clk_character “01”: clk_sample equals 2 * clk_character “10”: clk_sample equals 4 * clk_character “11”: clk_sample equals 8 * clk_character

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: CLK_RATIO
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Ratio between the clk_sample and clk_character

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PRBSTEST_0_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If prbs testing is enabled the number of detected error sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PRBSTEST_1_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If prbs testing is enabled the number of detected error sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PRBSTEST_2_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If prbs testing is enabled the number of detected error sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PRBSTEST_3_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If prbs testing is enabled the number of detected error sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: JTSPATTEST_0_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If JTSPAT testing is enabled the number of detected error sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: JTSPATTEST_1_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If JTSPAT testing is enabled the number of detected error sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: JTSPATTEST_2_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If JTSPAT testing is enabled the number of detected error sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: JTSPATTEST_3_ERRORCOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: If JTSPAT testing is enabled the number of detected error sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PRBSTEST_0_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received prbs sequences. If prbs testing is enabled the number of received prbs sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PRBSTEST_1_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received prbs sequences. If prbs testing is enabled the number of received prbs sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PRBSTEST_2_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received prbs sequences. If prbs testing is enabled the number of received prbs sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: PRBSTEST_3_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received prbs sequences. If prbs testing is enabled the number of received prbs sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: JTSPATTEST_0_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received JTSPAT sequences. If JTSPAT testing is enabled the number of received JTSPAT sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: JTSPATTEST_1_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received JTSPAT sequences. If JTSPAT testing is enabled the number of received JTSPAT sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: JTSPATTEST_2_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received JTSPAT sequences. If JTSPAT testing is enabled the number of received JTSPAT sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: JTSPATTEST_3_RECEIVECOUNTER
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Number of received JTSPAT sequences. If JTSPAT testing is enabled the number of received JTSPAT sequences is counted for lane 0.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: SOFT_SYNC
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Soft Sync 0 ~ Soft sync not used 1 ~ Soft sync used (refer Appendix A)
